Great story...nothing more, Nothing less

alright, lemme give you some context for this review; 4 years ago, i got pressured by a friend into buying this game for the level creator. played with it for 2 seconds, played co-op for 2 seconds, then never touched it again. i have never been a huge fan of first-person or puzzle games. i was also spoiled on like.. most of the major plot elements from the beginning. i REALLY didn't want to buy this game, but being a horrible emotional wreck at the time, I Did Anyway!

i have owned this game for 4 YEARS, and only started (and finished) the singleplayer about a week or so ago

now keeping this all in mind, let me tell you.
this game is SO GOT DANG GOOD.... EVEN BEING SPOILED ON THE PLOT... EVEN NOT WANTING TO BUY IT AT ALL... HOLY F R I C K IS IT GOOD
the writing ALONE is a major selling point. puzzles are great. made me feel like a very accomplished idiot by missing obvious solutions but then solving it myself. 

i havent touched the co-op yet at the time of writing this, BUT i have played through the entirety of singleplayer, and it is worth buying the game just for that alone - ill probably update the review once i play through co-op

tl;dr you don't need me to tell you this, you SEE the glowing reviews on this game, 
buy this game right now do it its so GOOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!! YEAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
What a great game. Nice and long with many puzzles. I love the new characters and new parts of the map. Easily the best Portal game

Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

This game is amazing. Good characters, deep story, funny and charming jokes, and a fully fleshed out puzzle-maker. If you like action, or some quiet puzzle-solving, this game has something for everyone. 10/10.

not in a million years I would think that I would be touched and so emotional about a PUZZLE game, first look you think people play this game for the game mechanics and the portal gun -I was-, the mechanics and game-play are something to be held, but the STORY oh my the story is phenomenal, from the subtle hints that there is something not right in the setting you are in, the antagonist's rivalry, betrayals, history, Allies, the lore, the music everything is working together softly and perfectly just like the facility you are in with a twist of dark humor that will make you laugh and wonder in the same time.

the ending is so satisfying that it feels weird to even want a sequel, it is a finished full stop to a lightly dark masterpiece that every component in it works as a perfect Swiss watch.

Fun challenge. 
The puzzles get difficult, and it feels great to overcome them.
The physics with portals is pretty cool too. I sometimes found myself playing with the portals for no other reason than it was fun, wasn't even trying to finish the puzzle.
The iconic dialogue is, of course, hilarious.
Great story/story-telling.

For a game as old as it is, it's still fun. I haven't even tried out the coop stuff, but i would definitely recommend this game to anyone who like puzzle games.

If you don't like puzzle games, i would not recommend it. For everyone else, it's a classic.

Ну як можна не написати рецензію на цю неймовірну гру?

Я проходила її все не раз, а от недавно купила на знижка і звісно ж перепройшла. 

Вона ідеальна! Головоломки складні і цікаві, набагато більше прикольних і офігенно продуманий фішок у порівнянні з першою частиною. Персонажі дуже виразні і гумор на висоті. Реально, діалоги (ну, монологи бо наша дівчинка мовчазна) прописані просто капець як класно! Ці всі саркастичні фразочки можна записувати і цитувати.

І як так вийшло, що це я вперше грала в оригіналі? Завжди проходила, просто господи, російською, і настільки ж краща оригінальна озвучка! Чого вартий тільки британський акцент робота Уітлі! Сказитися!

Отже, сто покоррапчених модулів зі ста, десять картоплин з десяти.
Да.
ребята эта игра ну ну ... ооооооооооооооооочень крутая всем советую

Played this game with my best friend shortly before his passing in 2017, it will forever be a game I hold close to my heart for this reason. The story mode is exciting and creative but the co-op mode is a whole lot of fun. 

If you like puzzle games, mental challenges and annoying your friends - this is a good co-op game and still stands up on it's own two feet even so many years later. I was late to Portal/Portal 2 but I thoroughly and wholeheartedly recommend it to new players who are on the fence :) 

Happy puzzle-solving!
